EmailTemplate.name: Time is running out
EmailTemplate.subject: Time is running out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
We haven’t connected recently and I want to make sure you have every opportunity to take advantage of the options to increase your presence as a Five Star Wealth Manager in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
Time is almost up for confirming a profile ad in the special advertising section of the magazines. There are a number of options to choose from and I’d be happy to provide additional information to help you make a decision. For more about how you were selected, how you will appear in {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}, and more options available to you, here’s our Award Guide.
2013 Five Star Wealth Manager Award Guide: {!Market__c.MSSB_Award_Guide__c}
Please note: Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner. Five Star Professional is the only approved provider of official plaques and other products related to your award. Trophy companies and other online vendors do not comply with industry regulatory requirements or firm compliance requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2117 Cliff Drive Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
